pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.13: [Sp.1.506](): _Aññātikāya vematiko aññātikāya ñātikasaññīti imānipi padāni vuttānaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena vitthārato veditabbāni_, “ʻIf she is unrelated, but he is unsure of it; if she is unrelated, but he perceives her as relatedʼ: these sentences should be understood in detail just as the stated three tetrads (above).”
